Message:
On the day she was
to leave the village,
my mother gave me a collar.

“If anything happens to me,
take care of everyone, okay?”

The collar was a precious
heirloom passed down
from queen to queen
through the generations.

Receiving this from
my mother meant that
rather than one of my sisters,
who were paralyzed
from the curse...

I had been selected
to succeed the throne.

“You are a loving girl who
always looks out for others.

That’s why I know you’ll
make a wonderful queen.”

“But, that does not mean
you have to do everything
by yourself, Matilda.
You are still young.”

“Depend on those around you—
your two sisters, your grandmother,
your personal guard Hilda...
They all would gladly
lend you their help.”

With those words,
my mother left the village.
Her destination—
the goddess’s temple.
